CustomField.description: GTMS-9708: If Role Start Date is in the first half of the FQ -> have the field read the first day of the FQ; If Role Start Date is in the second half of the FQ -> have the field read the first day of the next FQ
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used for provisioning US AE2 Load & Pool Credits
CustomField.label: Adjusted Role Start Date
